descriptors.name: protected_apploader_ota
descriptors.label: Community Support - Example of handling AppLoader OTA DFU from a (previously) bonded device
descriptors.description: Demonstrates method of allowing for AppLoader OTA DFU initialization only to devices which have previously bonded and while operator has physical access to device on connection initiating OTA.
